readable.title: 3543378438_47e2712486
readable.content: A man dressed in a green jacket is playing piano while a woman sings . A man is sitting in front of a harpsichord , and a woman is preparing to sing . A person playing the piano with a singer nearby . A pianist and a singer are ready to perform . The man in the green jacket is playing the piano next to a woman who is by a music stand .
